metadata.title: CVE-2013-2494 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
libdns in ISC DHCP 4.2.x before 4.2.5-P1 allows remote name servers tocause a denial of service (memory consumption) via vectors involving aregular expression, as demonstrated by a memory-exhaustion attack against amachine running a dhcpd process, a related issue to CVE-2013-2266.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2494` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

isc-dhcp-client - 4.2.4-7ubuntu12.3
isc-dhcp-common - 4.2.4-7ubuntu12.3
isc-dhcp-relay - 4.2.4-7ubuntu12.3
isc-dhcp-server - 4.2.4-7ubuntu12.3
isc-dhcp-server-ldap - 4.2.4-7ubuntu12.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: isc-dhcp package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.2.4-7ubuntu12.3').
